Jail for 501 after Porsche 911 stolen from Parnell home before Waikato Expressway police pursuit https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jail-for-501-after-porsche-911-stolen-from-parnell-home-before-waikato-expressway-police-pursuit/Z4H4DKYBABE55AVJ4GMTRI6K6I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jail-for-501-after-porsche-911-stolen-from-parnell-home-before-waikato-expressway-police-pursuit/Z4H4DKYBABE55AVJ4GMTRI6K6I/ Cherie HowiePinched Porsche 911 eventually recovered after dramatic wrong-way police pursuit. Sat, 18 Jan 2025 06:00:00 +0000 Ronald Neilson was sentenced in Auckland District Court on Thursday for a series of crimes, including his part in stealing a Porsche and Land Rover from a Parnell, Auckland home, and a subsequent police pursuit on the Waikato Expressway. Photo / Dean Purcell

Sisters relieved justice finally served after sex abuser William Wood jailed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sisters-relieved-justice-finally-served-after-sex-abuser-william-wood-jailed/IWXCAEQLCJEDRCXID6SQI3ZKOE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sisters-relieved-justice-finally-served-after-sex-abuser-william-wood-jailed/IWXCAEQLCJEDRCXID6SQI3ZKOE/ Tracy Neal'I’ve grown my wings... like I'm free and I feel really good that it’s all now out there.' Sat, 18 Jan 2025 02:00:00 +0000 William Wood was sentenced to prison in the Nelson District Court on historical sex abuse charges against two victims who were young girls at the time. They are relieved the ordeal is now over and can continue their healing. Photo / NZME
